articles.title: Fans arrested after troubling incidents as players are attacked - FourFourTwo
articles.description: Fans arrested after troubling incidents as players are attacked FourFourTwo Soccer player gets viciously attacked by fan, then scores game-winning goal USA TODAY Jack Grealish punched from behind by pitch invader in Aston Villa vs. Birmingham derby SB Nation …
articles.content:
Two fans were arrested for separate pitch invasions on Sunday, as Aston Villas Jack Grealish was punched while Manchester Uniteds Chris Smalling appeared to be pushed.
The nasty scenes are likely to spark a widespread discussion about safety at grounds every… [+6565 chars]
